task.prompt: c=$(ls -1 ~/panda/factory/output 2>/dev/null | wc -l); ts=$(date -Iseconds); echo 'COMPLETATO' > ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "PIPELINE=factory_v1" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "TIMESTAMP=$ts" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "FILES_PROCESSATI=$c" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt

steps.command: bash -c 'c=$(ls -1 ~/panda/factory/output 2>/dev/null | wc -l); ts=$(date -Iseconds); echo "COMPLETATO" > ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "PIPELINE=factory_v1" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "TIMESTAMP=$ts" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "FILES_PROCESSATI=$c" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt'
